author: hwright
msg: FSFS: Fix validation so it doesn't hork preexisting repositories that
triggered a bug once in their history.
Such repositories are unusable by 1.7.x without this revision.
Either this must be backported to 1.7.1 or r1186144 must be undone.

author: kturner
msg: ACCUMULO-10 made bulk import thrift calls require system permission
